author: sfgate.com
title: Happy Birthday, Drake!
text:
Photo: Jeffrey Mayer, Getty Images Image 1 of / 18 Caption
Close
Image 1 of 18 Drake started melting hearts young, during his Degrassi years. Here he is at the 2005 Teen Choice Awards. Only 18 years old! Aww. Drake started melting hearts young, during his Degrassi years. Here he is at the 2005 Teen Choice Awards. Only 18 years old! Aww. Photo: Jeffrey Mayer, Getty Images Image 2 of 18 The whole "DeGrassi High" crew at MTV's Total Request Live in 2007. (L-R) Cassie Steele, Shane Kippel, Aubrey Graham (otherwise known as Drake) and Shenae Grimes.. The whole "DeGrassi High" crew at MTV's Total Request Live in 2007. (L-R) Cassie Steele, Shane Kippel, Aubrey Graham (otherwise known as Drake) and Shenae Grimes.. Photo: Scott Gries, Getty Images Image 3 of 18 By his 20th birthday, Drake started to live his hip-hop dreams, attending a BET "106 & Park" taping in 2007. By his 20th birthday, Drake started to live his hip-hop dreams, attending a BET "106 & Park" taping in 2007. Photo: Ray Tamarra, Getty Images Image 4 of 18 2009 was a big year for Drake. He signed with Lil Wayne's Young Money Entertainment and dropped his first EP "So Far Gone." Here is feeling the music at a HOT 97 Summer Jam in 2009. 2009 was a big year for Drake. He signed with Lil Wayne's Young Money Entertainment and dropped his first EP "So Far Gone." Here is feeling the music at a HOT 97 Summer Jam in 2009. Photo: Johnny Nunez, Getty Images Image 5 of 18 Here he is at the Grammy's in 2009, giving the camera his "Drake eyes." Here he is at the Grammy's in 2009, giving the camera his "Drake eyes." Photo: Frazer Harrison, Getty Images Image 6 of 18 And of course, because Drake is the best son, he brings his mom, Sandi Graham, to the red carpet in 2010. And of course, because Drake is the best son, he brings his mom, Sandi Graham, to the red carpet in 2010. Photo: George Pimentel, Getty Images Image 7 of 18 Rumors of a love affair between singer Rihanna and Drake steam up the airwaves. The rapper is quoted saying Rihanna is his "ultimate fantasy." Here they attend Drake's after party at Greenhouse in 2010. Rumors of a love affair between singer Rihanna and Drake steam up the airwaves. The rapper is quoted saying Rihanna is his "ultimate fantasy." Here they attend Drake's after party at Greenhouse in 2010. Photo: Johnny Nunez, Getty Images Image 8 of 18 The birthday boy, cleaning up nice! The birthday boy, cleaning up nice! Photo: Johnny Nunez, Getty Images Image 9 of 18 2013, and Drake has some fancy friends (Beyonce and Jay-Z, for starters.) 2013, and Drake has some fancy friends (Beyonce and Jay-Z, for starters.) Photo: Kevin Mazur, Getty Images Image 10 of 18 Sometimes the fancy friends got a little too...close. Madonna has kissed many people on stage: Britney Spears, Christina Aguilera, and most recently, Drake at a Coachella concert in 2015. Sometimes the fancy friends got a little too...close. Madonna has kissed many people on stage: Britney Spears, Christina Aguilera, and most recently, Drake at a Coachella concert in 2015. Photo: Christopher Polk, Getty Images Image 11 of 18 Photos captured Drake's disgusted reaction, but he later said it was the 56-year-old's lipstick that was gross... Photos captured Drake's disgusted reaction, but he later said it was the 56-year-old's lipstick that was gross... Photo: Christopher Polk, Getty Images Image 12 of 18 Also, you know what? Drake loves sports. Here he is at the 2015 US Open. Also, you know what? Drake loves sports. Here he is at the 2015 US Open. Photo: Matthew Stockman, Getty Images Image 13 of 18 And here he is at a basketball game between the Oklahoma City Thunder and the Los Angeles Clippers. And here he is at a basketball game between the Oklahoma City Thunder and the Los Angeles Clippers. Photo: Noel Vasquez, Getty Images Image 14 of 18 Drake rocked the crowds during his 28th year. What will he do now that he's turned 29? Drake rocked the crowds during his 28th year. What will he do now that he's turned 29? Photo: George Pimentel, Getty Images Image 15 of 18 More rocking, we're positive of it. More rocking, we're positive of it. Photo: Gary Miller, Getty Images Image 16 of 18 Boom! Boom! Photo: David Wolff - Patrick, Getty Images Image 17 of 18 Happy Birthday, Drake! Happy Birthday, Drake! Photo: George Pimentel, Getty Images Image 18 of 18 Happy Birthday, Drake! 1  /  18 Back to Gallery Drake turns 29 years old on October 24. This means the smooth rapper's birthday lands on the first day of the Scorpio astrological sign. Let's take a look at how right this is.
Scorpio is the most sensual and passionate of the astrological signs, and Drake may be the most sensual of the popular rappers. I mean, just read these lyrics from "Best I Ever Had."
  Know you gotta roommate,/Call me when there's no one there,/Put a key under the mat and you know I be over there... You could have my heart, or we could share it like the last slice. 
Do you feel that? It's Drake's sensuality, and it's unavoidable.
Video: Drake's "Hotline Bling" Video Takes Over Twitter! The 28-year-old rapper does insane dance moves in his new music video and it's blowing up on social media! Check it out!
Media: San Francisco Chronicle When it comes to money and success, Scorpios set goals and stick to them. They don't give up. Did Drake give up after his character on "Degrassi: Next Generation" got shot in the back and he had to spend the rest of the series in a wheelchair? No. He wheeled that wheelchair around the set and kept acting, like a winner.
Did he give up when people thought he was too soft and Canadian to be a rapper? Not Drake. 
I done kept it real from the jump/Living at my mama's house we'd argue every morning/ I was trying to get it on my own/ Working all night, traffic on the way home.... Started from the bottom now we're here. 
The rapper has now won a Grammy, sold an estimated $10 million albums worldwide, popularized the acronym YOLO and, most recently, nerd-danced his way into the heart of social media (check that out in the video above).
The takeaway? Scorpios are deep and intense people. Drake is 29 years old, and we're happy he's rapping.
